Beatrice "Bea" Angela Duran bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị America na ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara mkpesa nke ndị otu si Las Vegas, Nevada, na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye otu Nevada Assembly.
A mụrụ Duran na 1963 na Cheyenne, Wyoming.

N N'afọ 1986, Duran, onye na-ere nri na Four Queens Hotel na Casino, malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na Culinary Workers Union, Las Vegas-based Local 226 nke UNITE HERE, ma nọrọ na ndị ọrụ ka otu ahụ nwetara nkwado n'ebe ahụ. Kemgbe afọ 1999 ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ maka Culinary Union, ebe ọ bụ ọkachamara na mkpesa na Ngalaba mkpesa ha.

N'ọnwa Disemba 2018, Clark County Commission họpụtara Duran dị ka onye otu Democratic iji nọchite anya mpaghara nke iri na otu (akụkụ Las Vegas na North Las Vegas) nke Nzukọ Nevada, iji dochie Olivia Diaz (onye gbara arụkwaghịm n'oche Nzukọ ya n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nhọpụta ọzọ, iji gbaa ọsọ maka Kansụl Obodo Las Vegas).
